channel.title: Entity Extraction on Bienvenue sur le site de Lean Deep
channel.description: Recent content in Entity Extraction on Bienvenue sur le site de Lean Deep

item.title: Extract & resolve geographic entities from unstructured text
item.description: In this article we are going to see how to install a great opensource tool called CLAVIN (Cartographic Location And Vicinity INdexer) that can extract and parse geographic entities from an unstructured text. The installation will be done on Ubuntu 18.04. Here is an example of what you can do: http://clavin.berico.us/clavin-web/ Here is the description of the tool coming from the official website: CLAVIN does not simply “look up” location names – it uses intelligent heuristics to identify exactly which “Springfield” (for example) was intended by the author, based on the context of the document.
